    • editFood

      public void editFood(Food food) throws PantsNotFoundException
      Updates the given food within the service and the database. Should throw a custom exception if the food's ID does not correspond with a food registered in the service.
      Parameters:
      food - the new version of the modified food
      Throws:
      PantsNotFoundException

    • removeFood

      public void removeFood(String id) throws PantsNotFoundException
      Removes the given food from the service and the database. Should throw a custom exception if the food is not found.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the food to be removed
      Throws:
      PantsNotFoundException

    • getFoodName

      public String getFoodName(String id) throws PantsNotFoundException

      Returns:
